LanguageData.RWBY_Ember_Celica_Gun.label: 灰燼天堂
LanguageData.RWBY_Ember_Celica_Gun.description: 灰燼天堂是Yang Xiao Long的標誌性武器. 這是一對具備射擊功能的護手(DRSG).
LanguageData.RWBY_Ember_Celica_Gun.tools.0.label: barrel

LanguageData.RWBY_Ember_Celica_Melee.tools.0.label: barrel
